```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemr)
ggthemr("flat", type = "outer")
```

```{r global, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
load("../data/un_smp_kecamatan.rda")
source("../R/grafik_un_smp.R")
```

Column 1 {.sidebar}
--------------------

### Pengaturan

```{r}
selectInput(
  inputId = "matpel", 
  label = "Mata Pelajaran",
  choices = c("Matematika", "IPA", "Bahasa Indonesia", "Bahasa Inggris")
)

selectInput(
  inputId = "tahun_awal", 
  label = "Tahun Awal", 
  choices = c(2015, 2016),
  selected = 2015
)

selectInput(
  inputId = "tahun_akhir", 
  label = "Tahun Akhir", 
  choices = c(2016, 2017),
  selected = 2017
)

textAreaInput(
  inputId = "judul",
  label = "Judul Grafik",
  value = "Perubahan Rerata Nilai Ujian Nasional"
)
```

Column 2 {data-width=700}
--------------------

### 

```{r}
renderPlot({
  grafik_un_smp(
      .data = un_smp_kecamatan, 
      matpel = input$matpel, 
      tahun_awal = input$tahun_awal, 
      tahun_akhir = input$tahun_akhir, 
      judul = input$judul)
})

```
